content: {"name": "Ethos - Amory Street Caf\u00e9", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* For seniors 60 and above and disabled \n* Call or email to reserve/RSVP.\nFor more information or to register to attend a Community Cafe near you, please call 617-477-6688 or email ethosmeals@ethocare.org", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/services/nutrition/community-cafes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "125 Amory Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Jamaica Plain", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02119", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3193421, "longitude": -71.10074829999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 522-6700", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors and people with disabilities"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required by phone"}]}
